comments:
I'm unable to edit any files as soon as I run or debug anything from Eclipse.
Eclipse 3.0 M8.

Version: 3.0.0
Build id: 200403261517

There are 3 exceptions in the log. Don't know if all three apply to this bug or 
only the last one.

I'm guessing debug component, moving report.

Rustam, we don't see this problem, I think it's a problem with your install of
Eclipse, the requested classes are in the jars.
Can you try to reinstall Eclipse ?

This appears to be happening because of MyEclipse IDE extension.
Therefore, feel free to close this bug.
